title: Ahmad Nasr
description: Self taught Front-End Engineer from Egypt. I make things for the web.

projects.title: react-todo-list-app
projects.description: Simple Todo list app built with React, Webpack and PostCSS. The data is all stored in the browser using the web storage object `localStorage`.

projects.title: clear-view-escapes-landing-page
projects.description: Responsive HTML landing page can help showcase services, applications or products. Built with Webpack, PostCSS and VanillaJS, Code Splitting and CSS Architecture (ITCSS, OOCSS, BEM).

projects.title: writescape-mern
